data.title: PayPay Integration Webinar
data.description: ウェブペイメント】第1回 PayPay Integration Webinar

sub_title.title: Set up PayPay
sub_title.description_1: First, you need a PayPay account. Register now.
sub_title.description_2: Use our official libraries for access to the PayPay API from your application:

code_snippet.python:
# If you love Python, you will love our pip installation package, 
  # simply run the following to ensure you have all the methods needed to make the integration
  $ pip install paypayopa
code_snippet.php:
##  Minimum required software requirements
  #  To use the Paypay OPA PHP SDK you need:

  #  A server compute environment (local machines, docker containers, VPS or dedicated servers, cloud infrastructure etc. )
  #  A web server to serve your API responses and html documents.
  #  PHP version 7.x interpreter to execute your backend code.
  #  Composer to manage your dependencies(recommended) or a release version from this repo to manually maintain your dependencies.
  
  #To install the bindings via Composer, add the following to composer.json:
    composer require paypayopa/php-sdk
code_snippet.java:
<!-- To install the API client library to your local Maven repository, simply execute: -->
  gradle install
  <!-- Maven: Add this dependency to your project's POM: -->
  <dependency>
    <groupId>jp.ne.paypay</groupId>
    <artifactId>paypayopa</artifactId>
    <version>0.8.0</version>
    <scope>compile</scope>
  </dependency>
  <!-- Gradle: Add this dependency to your project's build file: -->
  compile "jp.ne.paypay:paypayopa:0.8.0"

Integration.title: Create the order
Integration.description: Create the order with the necessary Order information and provide a button to Pay with PayPay.

Integration.title: Pay with PayPay
Integration.description: The user is redirected to his PayPay App for Payment process.

Integration.title: Display Payment Status
Integration.description: Information about the Payment is displayed to the User in his PayPay App.

Integration.title: Display Payment
Integration.description: Information about the Payment is displayed to the User in his PayPay App.

data.title: PayPay Integration Webinar
data.description: 【ネイティブペイメント】第2回 PayPay Integration Webinar

sub_title.title: Set up PayPay 2
sub_title.description_1: First, you need a PayPay account. Register now. 2
sub_title.description_2: Use our official libraries for access to the PayPay API from your application: 2

code_snippet.python:
import paypayopa 
 #Set True for Production Environment.By Default this is set False for Sandbox Environment. 
 client = paypayopa.Client(auth = (API_KEY, API_SECRET), production_mode = False) 
 client.set_assume_merchant('MERCHANT_ID')
